title: My Runes have been combined, my masteries deleted and my ip spent
body:
I haven't given my account to anyone, my account password is only known by me, or I only thought it was. I do log onto some internet cafe's and few friends house, but i doubt that they can do anything with that. 

Im just wondering If i can get my runes restored because this is ridiculous and I cant play like this in plat its impossible.

If anyone can help me please do so, it'll be much appreciated thanks!

replies.body: Just because you haven't given your password to anyone doesn't mean it hasn't been stolen. Send in a support ticket to Riot about this ASAP.
